price: Umunsi impanda izavuzwa, maze mukaza muri amatsinda.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
